languages.text: {n}В темной пасти сервитора невидимые раскаленные иглы пронзают ваше запястье — резкая боль длится не больше секунды. Электу на вашем запястье откроют вход в хранилища.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}В темной пасти сервитора невидимые раскаленные иглы пронзают ваше запястье — резкая боль длится не больше секунды. Электу на вашем запястье откроют вход в хранилища.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}В темной пасти сервитора невидимые раскаленные иглы пронзают ваше запястье — резкая боль длится не больше секунды. Электу на вашем запястье откроют вход в хранилища.{/n}

{n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

languages.text: {n}サーヴィターの暗い喉の奥深くから、目に見えない灼熱の針があなたの手首に突き刺さるが、鋭い痛みはほんの一瞬だった。あなたの手首に植えられたエレクトゥーは、リポジトリの扉を開けるのに十分はずだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}サーヴィターの暗い喉の奥深くから、目に見えない灼熱の針があなたの手首に突き刺さるが、鋭い痛みはほんの一瞬だった。あなたの手首に植えられたエレクトゥーは、リポジトリの扉を開けるのに十分はずだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dans le gosier du servitor, des aiguilles invisibles et brûlantes s'enfoncent dans votre poignet. Heureusement, la douleur disparaît après un instant. L'électrotatouage que vous possédez désormais devrait suffire à ouvrir les portes des reliquaires.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dans le gosier du servitor, des aiguilles invisibles et brûlantes s'enfoncent dans votre poignet. Heureusement, la douleur disparaît après un instant. L'électrotatouage que vous possédez désormais devrait suffire à ouvrir les portes des reliquaires.{/n}

languages.text: {n}机仆黑暗的咽喉深处，看不见的灼热针头刺入了你的手腕，但剧痛只持续了片刻。现在，植入你手腕的电镀体应该可以打开数据库的大门了。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}奴工黑暗的咽喉深处，看不见的灼热针头刺入了你的手腕，但剧痛只持续了片刻。现在，植入你手腕的电镀体应该可以打开数据库的大门了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En las profundidades de la garganta negra del servidor, unas agujas invisibles y ardientes atraviesan tu muñeca, pero el aguijonazo de dolor solo dura un instante. El electoo que se ha instalado en tu muñeca debería bastar para abrir las puertas del repositorio.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En las profundidades de la garganta negra del servidor, unas agujas invisibles y ardientes atraviesan tu muñeca, pero el aguijonazo de dolor solo dura un instante. El electoo que se ha instalado en tu muñeca debería bastar para abrir las puertas del repositorio.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tief im dunklen Schlund des Servitors stechen sich unsichtbare, brennend heiße Nadeln in dein Handgelenk, doch der scharfe Schmerz hält nur einen Augenblick lang an. Das Elektoo, das in dein Handgelenk implantiert wurde, sollte ausreichen, um die Türen des Repositoriums zu öffnen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Tief im dunklen Schlund des Servitors stechen sich unsichtbare, brennend heiße Nadeln in dein Handgelenk, doch der scharfe Schmerz hält nur einen Augenblick lang an. Das Elektoo, das in dein Handgelenk implantiert wurde, sollte ausreichen, um die Türen des Repositoriums zu öffnen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Hizmetörün karanlık boğazının derinliklerindeki görünmez, kor gibi yanan iğneler; bileğini deliyor. Gelgelelim bu keskin acıyı yalnızca bir an için hissediyorsun. Bileğine nüfuz eden elektrodövme, depo kapılarını açmanı sağlayacaktır.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Deep within the servitor's dark gullet, unseen, burning-hot needles pierce your wrist, but the sharp pain only lasts a moment. The electoo that has been planted inside your wrist should be enough to open the repository doors.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Hizmetörün karanlık boğazının derinliklerinde görünmez, kor gibi yanan iğneler bileğini deliyor. Fakat bu keskin acıyı yalnızca bir an için hissediyorsun. Bileğine nüfuz eden elektrodövme, depo kapılarını açmanı sağlayacaktır.{/n}
